title: Sounds Of War 1 - Medieval Blades, Sword and Weapons
description: HQ medieval weapon attacks pack. Multiple variations are included for a pro sound that never gets boring or repetitive! Sword, Battle Axe, Hammer, Spear, Flail, Bow & Arrow, Combo attacks, and flying projectiles! Now updated with 74 vocalized battle SFX!
longDescription:
'Sounds Of War 1' is the first in a series of professionally designed combat sound packs. Every SFX has multiple variations so that you're able to trigger them randomly for the chosen attack. This is a must-have option for avoiding the infamous 'machine gun effect' when the same attack is used repeatedly. We also included missed attacks and shield defense SFX.


NOTE: The swing of the weapon (whoosh) and the impact of the weapon are not separated in this pack. They are connected in order to provide a quick solution for games that do not have missed target dynamics.



Save Money And Get Our Sounds Of War Bundle.

Save And Get It As A Part Of Our Medieval Melee Bundle


  • Use your imagination to combine the sounds for more advanced combos! Example: Bow Release + Flying Loop (loops as long as needed to reach the target) + Projectile Cut
  • The majority of our vocalized SFX can be used for the same character animations as their non-vocalized counterparts, without any extra adjustments. There are only a few that were moved slightly because vocals needed to fit a few milliseconds before the weapon impact.


UPDATES SO FAR:

UPDATE 1: 74 vocalized battle SFX, for even more realism and flexibility. Future updates are on the way because we want to make this the most versatile medieval combat SFX pack ever created.

UPDATE 2 (January 18.): 10 SFX from our Sounds Of War 2: Weapons and Armor Inventory SFX pack as a bonus!

UPDATE 3: ( 26.03) Standard Additions (+ 9 SFX)


SoundCloud Preview Demo: 1st track is a randomly selected SFX mockup that shows how good these samples work even on a busy battlefield! 2nd track previews our newest addition of vocalized battle SFX!

Files Included List


Please consider leaving a review if you're satisfied with your purchase. It would help a lot! I also love to hear your needs and ideas for the future packs and updates, write me at cyberwaveorchestra@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 193

Number of Audio Cues: 193

Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV

Does music loop: (some of the flying effects are loopable)

Minutes of audio provided: 3:00 min

Supported Development Platforms: All

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Update 3 brings you a few battle loops and weapon clashes.
